#summary How to install and run SubDownloader on Windows
#labels Featured

= version 2.0.x : Installer =
  * Download and install [https://code.launchpad.net/subdownloader/+download SubDownloader2 Installer for Windows XP/Vista]

== or Run from Sources = 
  * Install [http://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.5.2/python-2.5.2.msi python 2.5 for Windows]
  * Install latest [http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/static/Downloads/PyQt4/PyQt-Py2.5-gpl-4.4.2-1.exe PyQT for Windows]
  * Download and uncompress the latest [https://code.launchpad.net/subdownloader/+download sources ] (TAR.GZ)
  * *Graphical Interface:* Execute "python _run.py_" (or double click on the file *run.py*)
  * *Command line version:* Execute "python _run.py --help_" to see all the options available

*Note:* It's a beta version. Please give us your [https://bugs.launchpad.net/subdownloader feedback]. Thanks.
